name: Those who loved you the most
name_original: Those who loved you the most
description:
"Seriously, you're 25 and you think it's a good idea?

I tell you, it's not.

I get it, you were alone and who knows why, you started to think about your life and stuff, but meeting with your exes... I'm not sure it'll be of any good for you.

But, hey, feel free to ignore me and do it anyway, like you always do!"

In this interactive fiction, you've decided to meet your ex partners to ask them a series of questions. It takes 15~25min to complete.

This is a work of fiction.
